title: Taxi and for-hire vehicle licenses (medallions)
dataVerified: Driver name, vehicle ID, license number, company, issuing authority
dataVisibleAfterVerification: License status (active/expired/suspended). Link to TLC/taxi commission system (passengers and enforcement, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake taxi licenses. Domain binding verifies TLC/taxi commission. High-value medallions ($100K-$1M in some cities). Passenger safety verification. Insurance compliance.
